import useGetBugs from "../../helpers/hooks/useGetBugs" import { useAuthorize } from "../../helpers/hooks/useAuthorize" import Bug from "./Bug" import { Header } from "../index" const ViewBugs = () => { const bugs = useGetBugs() console.log(bugs) const isAuthorized = useAuthorize("manager/createprojects") return ( isAuthorized && bugs && ( <>

) ) } export default ViewBugs
